import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Navbar, Footer } from "./CommonUI"; import "../css/dashboard.css"; impo const Dashboard = ({ isDarkMode, toggleDarkMode }) => { const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(false); const [recordPage, setRecordPage] = useState(0); const toggleSidebar = () => setSidebarOpen(!sidebarOpen); const leaderboard = [ { rank: 1, name: "Alice", score: "95%" }, { rank: 2, name: "Bob", score: "90%" }, { rank: 3, name: "Charlie", score: "85%" }, { rank: 4, name: "David", score: "82%" }, { rank: 5, name: "Eve", score: "80%" }, ]; const pastRecords = [ { date: "01-10-2025", score: "80%" }, { date: "05-10-2025", score: "75%" }, { date: "10-10-2025", score: "82%" }, { date: "15-10-2025", score: "78%" }, { date: "20-10-2025", score: "88%" }, { date: "25-10-2025", score: "85%" }, { date: "30-10-2025", score: "90%" }, { date: "04-11-2025", score: "92%" }, { date: "09-11-2025", score: "87%" }, { date: "14-11-2025", score: "89%" }, ]; const last5Exams = [ { day: "Day 1", percentage: 80 }, { day: "Day 2", percentage: 75 }, { day: "Day 3", percentage: 82 }, { day: "Day 4", percentage: 78 }, { day: "Day 5", percentage: 88 }, ]; const averageMarks = 78; const totalDaysActive = 45; const totalAttempts = 10; const position = "3rd"; return (
{/* SIDEBAR */}
{sidebarOpen && (

Profile

Name: Shamal Gaykwad

Email: shamal@gmai.com

Role: Student

)}
{/* MAIN CONTENT */}

Dashboard

{/* SUMMARY CARDS */}
{[ { title: "Total Attempts", value: totalAttempts }, { title: "Total Days Active", value: totalDaysActive }, { title: "Position", value: position }, ].map((card, idx) => (
{card.title}
{card.value}
))}
{/* PAST EXAM RECORDS */}

Past Exam Records

{pastRecords.slice(recordPage * 5, recordPage * 5 + 5).map((record, idx) => ( ))}
S.No Date Score
{recordPage * 5 + idx + 1} {record.date} {record.score}
{/* PIE CHART */}
{averageMarks}%
This pie chart represents your average marks across all attempted exams.
{/* LAST 5 EXAMS PERFORMANCE */}

Last 5 Exams Performance

{[100, 75, 50, 25, 0].map((val, idx) => ( {val}% ))}
{last5Exams.map((exam, idx) => (
{exam.percentage}%
{exam.day}
))}
{/* LEADERBOARD */}

Leaderboard (Top 5)

{leaderboard.map((item) => ( ))}
Rank Name Score
{item.rank} {item.name} {item.score}
); }; export default Dashboard;
